FULL TITLE : AN ACT RESTRUCTURING THE INCOME TAX IMPOSED ON INDIVIDUALS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE SECTION 24 OF THE NATIONAL INTERNAL REVENUE CODE OF 1997, AS AMENDED
ABSTRACT : Seeks to correct the phenomenon of bracket creep by adjusting the individual income tax brackets to account for inflation thus reinstating the original and noble intention of the National Internal Revenue Code (NIRC) of 1997 which provides an equitable and progressive system of taxation.
